PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-05132011-03-25,  ,  DFAIT,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectConvention concerning the Promotional Framework for Occupational Safety and Health **RATIFICATION**
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to ratify on behalf of Canada the CONVENTION CONCERNING THE PROMOTIONAL FRAMEWORK FOR OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH, adopted at Geneva on 15 June 2006.
AttachmentsAttachment
